meanings.definition: Relating to or caused by an allergic reaction.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that her red, itchy skin was atopic.
meanings.sent2: She always carries an EpiPen due to her atopic condition.
meanings.sent3: The cat sneezed atopic fur all over the room, making everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: His atopic sensitivity to pollen turned the garden into a battlefield of sneezes.
meanings.sent5: The atopic rash spread like wildfire, leaving a trail of discomfort in its wake.

meanings.definition: Having a tendency to develop allergies.
meanings.sent1: The atopic child avoided certain foods to prevent allergic reactions.
meanings.sent2: Growing up in a pollen-heavy area, she knew she was atopic.
meanings.sent3: The atopic puppy kept sneezing at the sight of flowers, much to everyone's amusement.
meanings.sent4: Her atopic nature towards seafood made her birthday dinner a challenge.
meanings.sent5: His atopic predisposition to allergies made him cautious in new environments.

meanings.sent4: The atopic nature of the rash made it impossible to ignore.
